attributes.action: Theresa May to resign with new PM who believes in Brexit to finish negotiations
attributes.background: Theresa May does not respect the will of the people, to leave the EU. She's shown this numerous times e.g. with her deals and extending our stay in the EU even after over 2 years of her (child-like) negotiations. Therefore we must have a new leader to strengthen our outro switfly and efficiently.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/

In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

https://www.royal.uk/queen-and-government
